languages.text: {n}Ваш двойник решительно рубит воздух рукой, и вы замечаете некоторую скованность движения, а также едва уловимую гримасу боли. Приглядевшись, вы понимаете, что под одеждой вашей копии находятся вериги — покаянные цепи с зазубренными крюками, впивающимися в плоть. Такие инструменты смирения носят лишь самые истовые из верующих.{/n}

{n}Your doppelganger vigorously chops the air with {mf|his|her} hand, and you notice some stiffness in the movement, as well as a subtle grimace of pain. As you look closer, you realise that lurking under your replica's clothes are chains of penance with jagged hooks digging into {mf|his|her} flesh. Such instruments of humility are only worn by the most fervent believers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш двойник решительно рубит воздух рукой, и вы замечаете некоторую скованность движения, а также едва уловимую гримасу боли. Приглядевшись, вы понимаете, что под одеждой вашей копии находятся вериги — покаянные цепи с зазубренными крюками, впивающимися в плоть. Такие инструменты смирения носят лишь самые истовые из верующих.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre sosie frappe vigoureusement dans le vide avec son poing, et vous remarquez une certaine raideur dans son geste, ainsi qu'une discrète grimace de douleur. En l'observant plus attentivement, vous discernez sous les vêtements de votre double des chaînes pourvues de crochets dentelés mordant sa chair. Seuls les plus fervents croyants portent des instruments de pénitence de ce genre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger vigorously chops the air with {mf|his|her} hand, and you notice some stiffness in the movement, as well as a subtle grimace of pain. As you look closer, you realise that lurking under your replica's clothes are chains of penance with jagged hooks digging into {mf|his|her} flesh. Such instruments of humility are only worn by the most fervent believers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre sosie frappe vigoureusement dans le vide avec son poing, et vous remarquez une certaine raideur dans son geste, ainsi qu'une discrète grimace de douleur. En l'observant plus attentivement, vous discernez sous les vêtements de votre double des chaînes pourvues de crochets dentelés mordant sa chair. Seuls les plus fervents croyants portent des instruments de pénitence de ce genre.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}Tu copia corta vigorosamente el aire con la mano, pero notas una cierta rigidez en sus movimientos y un sutil gesto de dolor. Mirando bien, te das cuenta de que bajo la ropa de tu réplica hay cadenas de penitencia cuyos ganchos serrados se clavan en su carne. Estos instrumentos humildes solo los usan los creyentes más fervorosos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger vigorously chops the air with {mf|his|her} hand, and you notice some stiffness in the movement, as well as a subtle grimace of pain. As you look closer, you realise that lurking under your replica's clothes are chains of penance with jagged hooks digging into {mf|his|her} flesh. Such instruments of humility are only worn by the most fervent believers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu copia corta vigorosamente el aire con la mano, pero notas una cierta rigidez en sus movimientos y un sutil gesto de dolor. Mirando bien, te das cuenta de que bajo la ropa de tu réplica hay cadenas de penitencia cuyos ganchos serrados se clavan en su carne. Estos instrumentos humildes solo los usan los creyentes más fervorosos.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}你的复制人有力地拍打着空气。你注意到，{mf|他|她}的动作有些僵硬，脸上还带着某种微妙的痛苦表情。你仔细观察，留意到{mf|他|她}衣服下面带着苦修的铁链，锯齿状的钩子扎进了{mf|他|她}的肉体之中。只有最虔诚的信徒，才会佩戴这种谦卑的饰品。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger vigorously chops the air with {mf|his|her} hand, and you notice some stiffness in the movement, as well as a subtle grimace of pain. As you look closer, you realise that lurking under your replica's clothes are chains of penance with jagged hooks digging into {mf|his|her} flesh. Such instruments of humility are only worn by the most fervent believers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的复制人有力地拍打着空气。你注意到，{mf|他|她}的动作有些僵硬，脸上还带着某种微妙的痛苦表情。你仔细观察，留意到{mf|他|她}衣服下面带着苦修的铁链，锯齿状的钩子扎进了{mf|他|她}的肉体之中。只有最虔诚的信徒，才会佩戴这种谦卑的饰品。{/n}
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}あなたのドッペルゲンガーがその手で勢いよく空気を切り裂く。あなたはその動きに硬さがあること、そしてドッペルゲンガーがかすかに痛みに苦笑を浮かべていることに気付いた。よく見ると、レプリカの服の下に潜んでいるのはギザギザのフックがその身に食い込む懺悔の鎖だ。このような謙遜の道具は、熱心な信者だけが身につけるものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger vigorously chops the air with {mf|his|her} hand, and you notice some stiffness in the movement, as well as a subtle grimace of pain. As you look closer, you realise that lurking under your replica's clothes are chains of penance with jagged hooks digging into {mf|his|her} flesh. Such instruments of humility are only worn by the most fervent believers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたのドッペルゲンガーがその手で勢いよく空気を切り裂く。あなたはその動きに硬さがあること、そしてドッペルゲンガーがかすかに痛みに苦笑を浮かべていることに気付いた。よく見ると、レプリカの服の下に潜んでいるのはギザギザのフックがその身に食い込む懺悔の鎖だ。このような謙遜の道具は、熱心な信者だけが身につけるものだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}{mf|Dein Doppelgänger|Deine Doppelgängerin} hackt mit der Hand kraftvoll in die Luft, und du bemerkst, dass {mf|seine|ihre} Bewegungen etwas steif sind und {mf|er|sie} vor Schmerzen leicht das Gesicht verzieht. Als du näher hinsiehst, erkennst du, dass unter der Kleidung deiner Kopie Büßerketten mit gezackten Haken hängen, die sich in ihr Fleisch graben. Solche Instrumente der Demut tragen nur die glühendsten Gläubigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger vigorously chops the air with {mf|his|her} hand, and you notice some stiffness in the movement, as well as a subtle grimace of pain. As you look closer, you realise that lurking under your replica's clothes are chains of penance with jagged hooks digging into {mf|his|her} flesh. Such instruments of humility are only worn by the most fervent believers.{/n}

traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}Suretçalan, hırsla ellerini havada sallıyor. Hareketlerindeki tutukluğu ve yüzündeki acı ifadesini fark ediyorsun. Yakından bakınca kopyanın kıyafetlerinin altında etine batan sivri kancalara sahip ceza zincirleri olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Bu tevazu araçları, sadece en hararetli inançlılar tarafından takılır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger vigorously chops the air with {mf|his|her} hand, and you notice some stiffness in the movement, as well as a subtle grimace of pain. As you look closer, you realise that lurking under your replica's clothes are chains of penance with jagged hooks digging into {mf|his|her} flesh. Such instruments of humility are only worn by the most fervent believers.{/n}
